category.name: wbb.acp.importer
category.item: Database tables with the given installation number could not be found.
Use Burning Board 2 password encryption (only Burning Board 2.0.x and Burning Board Lite 1.0.x)

Burning Board 2 uses an alternative algorithm to encrypt user passwords than Burning Board 3. Enable this option to use the encryption algorithm of Burning Board 2, so that the imported users can login with their old passwords. Note that passwords of existing users will become invalid by this change. Please enter your administrator password to save it again encrypted with the new algorithm. Do NOT enable this option if you import data from Burning Board 2.1.x or higher.
No Burning Board installation could be found under the given path.
